headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for Fibaro Home Center 3.

name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the homebridge log.
name.title: Name

url.description: URL of the Fibaro Home Center 3 machine. Must contain protocol and host name, e.g: https://hc-00000XXX.local
url.title: Url

host.description: IP address (or hostname) of the Fibaro Home Center 3 machine. Ignored if Url is present
host.title: Host

username.description: Username for accessing Fibaro Home Center 3 machine.
username.title: Username

password.description: Password for accessing Fibaro Home Center 3 machine.
password.title: Password

pollerperiod.description: Polling interval for querying Fibaro Home Center 3 machine (0: disabled).
pollerperiod.title: Poller period

switchglobalvariables.description: A comma separeted list of Fibaro Home Center 3 global variables acting like a bistable switch.
switchglobalvariables.title: Global variables switches

dimmerglobalvariables.description: A comma separeted list of Fibaro Home Center 3 global variables acting like a dimmer.
dimmerglobalvariables.title: Global variables switches

securitysystem.description: Enable or disable the Security system, see wiki for detail.
securitysystem.title: Security system
